page.title: 01OXSHOTT & ENVIRONS
page.content: This is an attractive residential area with open spaces, woods and fields in an undulating landscape. The busy dual carriageway A3 passes through the NW corner and the Waterloo to Guildford commuter railway line passes through NE to SW. The area covers Oxshott and part of Cobham and is part of the Green Belt. Some of Oxshott is Crown Estate land with many restrictions on the sort of buildings that can be erected. The houses are mixed in type - there are several estates of smaller houses with small gardens and also many large mansions surrounded by beautiful gardens. There are 3 different types of schools, some small shops and 2 churches. There is virtually no local industry and many of the residents work in London.
